snippet: An interview with the architect and conductor about the Pierre Boulez Saal, which opens on Saturday with a sprawling, three-hour concert....

headline.main: Frank Gehry and Daniel Barenboim on Their New Concert Hall in Berlin
headline.print_headline: Frank Gehry and Daniel Barenboim on Their New Concert Hall in Berlin

lead_paragraph: An interview with the architect and conductor about the Pierre Boulez Saal, which opens on Saturday with a sprawling, three-hour concert.
